languages.text: Собирая воедино истекающие кровью миры, Вольный Торговец решил{mf||ась} выстроить нечто более благородное и цивилизованное на месте Простора — прибежище для тех, кто остался без защиты или не мог отыскать свое место в строгой иерархии Империума. Вольное пограничье, где еще можно было отыскать толику свободы и милосердия.

Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the Expanse — a haven for those drifting and unprotected in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. It would be an unbound frontier, where freedom and compassion were not wholly extinct.
languages.original_text: Собирая воедино истекающие кровью миры, Вольный Торговец решил{mf||ась} выстроить нечто более благородное и цивилизованное на месте Простора — прибежище для тех, кто остался без защиты или не мог отыскать свое место в строгой иерархии Империума. Вольное пограничье, где еще можно было отыскать толику свободы и милосердия.

traits.locale_text: Gathering bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the place of the Expanse. A haven for those who were left without protection and could not find a place in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. An unbound frontier, where one could still find a touch of freedom and compassion.

Gathering bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the place of the Expanse. A haven for those who were left without protection and could not find a place in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. An unbound frontier, where one could still find a touch of freedom and compassion.

Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the Expanse — a haven for those drifting and unprotected in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. It would be an unbound frontier, where freedom and compassion were not wholly extinct.

Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the Expanse — a haven for those drifting and unprotected in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. It would be an unbound frontier, where freedom and compassion were not wholly extinct.

Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the Expanse — a haven for those drifting and unprotected in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. It would be an unbound frontier, where freedom and compassion were not wholly extinct.

Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the Expanse — a haven for those drifting and unprotected in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. It would be an unbound frontier, where freedom and compassion were not wholly extinct.

languages.text: 行商浪人将饱受摧残的世界重新团结起来，大胆地在科罗努斯扩区建立起了更加高贵、更加文明的制度。那些在帝国严格等级制度中找不到一席之地的人，都可以来这里寻得庇护。扩区变成了一片不受约束的边缘地带，在这里，人们仍可以寻得一丝自由与怜悯。
languages.original_text: Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the Expanse — a haven for those drifting and unprotected in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. It would be an unbound frontier, where freedom and compassion were not wholly extinct.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人将饱受摧残的世界重新团结起来，大胆地在科罗努斯扩区建立起了更加高贵、更加文明的制度。那些在帝国严格等级制度中找不到一席之地的人，都可以来这里寻得庇护。扩区变成了一片不受约束的边缘地带，在这里，人们仍可以寻得一丝自由与怜悯。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} klaubte die blutenden Welten der Ausdehnung wieder auf und wagte es etwas Edleres und Zivilisierteres aufzubauen — einen sicheren Hafen für all jene, die in der strikten Hierarchie des Imperiums ungeschützt umhertrieben. Es sollte ein ungebundenes Grenzgebiet werden, in dem die Freiheit und das Mitgefühl noch nicht völlig ausgestorben waren.
languages.original_text: Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the Expanse — a haven for those drifting and unprotected in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. It would be an unbound frontier, where freedom and compassion were not wholly extinct.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} klaubte die blutenden Welten der Ausdehnung wieder auf und wagte es etwas Edleres und Zivilisierteres aufzubauen — einen sicheren Hafen für all jene, die in der strikten Hierarchie des Imperiums ungeschützt umhertrieben. Es sollte ein ungebundenes Grenzgebiet werden, in dem die Freiheit und das Mitgefühl noch nicht völlig ausgestorben waren.

languages.text: Rassemblant de nouveau ses mondes exsangues, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} osa fonder quelque chose de plus noble et de plus civilisé dans les Étendues : un refuge destiné aux laissés pour compte de la stricte hiérarchie de l'Imperium. {mf|Il|Elle} voulait créer un monde sans frontières, où la liberté et la compassion auraient toute leur place.
languages.original_text: Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the Expanse — a haven for those drifting and unprotected in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. It would be an unbound frontier, where freedom and compassion were not wholly extinct.

traits.locale_text: Rassemblant de nouveau ses mondes exsangues, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} osa fonder quelque chose de plus noble et de plus civilisé dans les Étendues : un refuge destiné aux laissés pour compte de la stricte hiérarchie de l'Imperium. {mf|Il|Elle} voulait créer un monde sans frontières, où la liberté et la compassion auraient toute leur place.

languages.text: Con sus mundos ensangrentados unificados de nuevo, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente osó construir algo más noble y civilizado en la Extensión: un refugio para los desdichados y desamparados por la estricta jerarquía del Imperium. Su intención era crear una frontera sin límites en la que la libertad y la compasión pudieran existir.
languages.original_text: Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the Expanse — a haven for those drifting and unprotected in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. It would be an unbound frontier, where freedom and compassion were not wholly extinct.

traits.locale_text: Con sus mundos ensangrentados unificados de nuevo, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente osó construir algo más noble y civilizado en la Extensión: un refugio para los desdichados y desamparados por la estricta jerarquía del Imperium. Su intención era crear una frontera sin límites en la que la libertad y la compasión pudieran existir.

languages.text: 悲痛にあえぐ世界をいま一度束ねることで、自由開拓者は尊く文明的な何がしかをエクスパンスに打ち立てた。それは帝国の厳然たる階級制からこぼれ落ちた浮浪の民にとっての安息の地となった。そこは自由と思いやりが完全には潰えていない、束縛のない開拓地となるだろう。
languages.original_text: Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the Expanse — a haven for those drifting and unprotected in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. It would be an unbound frontier, where freedom and compassion were not wholly extinct.

traits.locale_text: 悲痛にあえぐ世界をいま一度束ねることで、自由開拓者は尊く文明的な何がしかをエクスパンスに打ち立てた。それは帝国の厳然たる階級制からこぼれ落ちた浮浪の民にとっての安息の地となった。そこは自由と思いやりが完全には潰えていない、束縛のない開拓地となるだろう。

languages.text: Can vermek üzere olan dünyalarını yeniden bir araya getiren Hür Tacir; Enginlik'te asilce ve uygarca bir şey yapıp savunmasız olanlar ve İmparatorluk'un sert hiyerarşisi tarafından korunmayanlar için bir sığınak inşa etmeye karar verdi. Kafasında, özgürlüğün ve merhametin tamamen yok olmadığı, bağımsız bir yer hayal etti.
languages.original_text: Gathering its bleeding worlds together again, the Rogue Trader dared to build something more noble and civilised in the Expanse — a haven for those drifting and unprotected in the strict hierarchy of the Imperium. It would be an unbound frontier, where freedom and compassion were not wholly extinct.

traits.locale_text: Can vermek üzere olan dünyalarını yeniden bir araya getiren Hür Tacir, Enginlik'te daha asil ve daha uygar bir şey, savunmasız olanlar ve İmparatorluk'un sert hiyerarşisi tarafından korunmayanlar için bir sığınak inşa etmeye karar verdi. Özgürlüğün ve merhametin tamamen yok olmadığı, bağımsız bir yer.
